item.title: Android Forensics Tools
item.description: Android Forensics Tools My personal compilation of tools for Android Forensics and Analysis. I will be extending this list. ADB Useful to interact with Android devices via command line. ðŸ”— Download ADB Commands: adb devices # List connected devices adb shell # Start shell on device adb install .\app-debug.apk # Install app adb pull /sdcard/data.txt # Copy file from device adb push # Ex (adb push .\frida-server-16.7.14-android-x86_64 /data/local/tmp/) adb logcat # View device logs LiME (Linux Memory Extractor) Dumping volatile memory from Android devices.
